Bibliographic References: Erika Simon, The Kurashiki Ninagawa Museum, p. 144, no. 79 (ill.); Greek and Etruscan Arts (Tokyo, 1974), pi. 54; Ancient and Modern Art in the KM., pi. 31 (colour).
Imagery Description: (a) Maenad with thyrsus and phiale, seated halfNon Sepcifieddraped Dionysos with reed of flute and thyrsus, (b) A3c + A2; both with sticks.
